titles.title: Making Rural America Count Act
Making Rural America Count Act
To provide that determinations of eligibility and level of assistance for rural development programs shall be made without regard to incarcerated prisoner populations.

bill.summary:
Making Rural America Count Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Agriculture from including incarcerated prison populations when determining eligibility or the levels of assistance for rural development programs.
